00026    /* 
00027    * Read nAtom and type.
00028    */
00029    void HomoRing::readSpeciesParam(std::istream &in)
00030    {
00031       read<int>(in,"nAtom", nAtom_);
00032       read<int>(in,"type", type_);
00033       nBond_  = nAtom_;
00034       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00035       nAngle_ = nAtom_;
00036       #endif
00037       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00038       nDihedral_ = nAtom_;
00039       #endif
00040       buildRing();
00041    }
00042  
00043    /* 
00044    * Return type_ for every atom.
00045    */
00046    int HomoRing::calculateAtomTypeId(int index) const
00047    { return type_; }
00048  
00049    /* 
00050    * Return 0 for every bond.
00051    */
00052    int HomoRing::calculateBondTypeId(int index) const
00053    { return 0; }
00054 
00055    #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00056    /* 
00057    * Return 0 for every angle.
00058    */
00059    int HomoRing::calculateAngleTypeId(int index) const
00060    { return 0; }
00061    #endif
